componentMetadata.docblock: A date input field that accepts values for month and year

childrenComponentProp.name: required
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Render marker indicating field is required.

childrenComponentProp.name: validation
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Result of custom validation. Should include a valid prop and a message prop.

childrenComponentProp.name: name
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Used to create unique name attributes for each input.

childrenComponentProp.name: date
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Date value. Should have month, day, and year props

defaultValue.value: 'Please provide a valid month and/or year'
